pyqgis_plugin.name: UMEP
pyqgis_plugin.about: UMEP is an extensive plugin designed for urban climate in general and climate sensitive planning applications in particular. The plugin consist of a pre-processor, a processor and a post-processor. This plugin is a collaboration between University of Gothenburg, University of Helsinki and University of Reading.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Fredrik Lindberg, Sue Grimmond, Niklas Krave, Helen Ward, Leena Jarvi, Christoph Kent, Shiho Onomura
